description: Supports site selection and building footprint configuration.
name: Site

inputs.name: Lot
inputs.description: Selected site including boundary and topography.

inputs.name: Site Setback
inputs.description: Position of the building footprint relative to the site boundary.

inputs.name: Building Length
inputs.description: Dimension of the bounding box for a building footprint.

inputs.name: Building Width
inputs.description: Dimension of the bounding box for a building footprint.

inputs.name: Search Grid Resolution
inputs.description: Interval for trial placements of building footprints within the site boundary.

inputs.name: Search Seed
inputs.description: Tandom seed determining the order of placement point search in the grid.

outputs.name: Lot Coverage Ratio
outputs.description: Ratio of footprint area to site area.
